content.en: Bug prediction: Researchers have been exploring the effectiveness of machine learning algorithms in various aspects of software development. They have investigated how these algorithms can be used to predict software bugs, identify high-impact bug reports, assess bug severity, classify bug reports, and detect bug-inducing commits. The studies have shown that ensemble-based machine learning, imbalanced learning strategies, and various supervised machine learning algorithms can be effective in addressing these challenges. By leveraging machine learning techniques, developers can improve software efficiency and enhance the overall quality of software projects.
content.da: Fejlforudsigelse: Forskere har undersøgt effektiviteten af maskinlæringsalgoritmer inden for forskellige aspekter af softwareudvikling. De har undersøgt, hvordan disse algoritmer kan bruges til at forudsige softwarefejl, identificere højprofilerede fejlrapporter, vurdere fejls alvorlighed, klassificere fejlrapporter og opdage fejlinducerende commits. Studierne har vist, at ensemble-baseret maskinlæring, ubalancerede læringsstrategier og forskellige overvågede maskinlæringsalgoritmer kan være effektive til at tackle disse udfordringer. Ved at udnytte maskinlæringsteknikker kan udviklere forbedre softwareeffektiviteten og øge den overordnede kvalitet af softwareprojekter.
